file_content.text: That heat resistor you gave Paul helped, but it was still too much for him. He's passed out.
Paul didn't make it... he held out hope 'til the end. It wasn't a pleasant way to go.
You're on your own from here.
Whatever you say.
Could have been you, too.
Yes, thanks to you and Paul we all are.
Paul knew what he was getting into.
He made his bed.
He was a good man.
Thank the stars, you made it!
You're a credit to your kind, bounty hunter. Thank you.
You're welcome.
I am pretty great.
Don't worry. He'll make it, even if I have to drag him all the way.
Don't get captured again. I'm not handling anymore rescues.
Watch yourselves.
You're right... thanks for your assistance.
Nice you put aside your differences.
He deserves to make it.
If I make it off this ice ball, I'm petitioning for a discharge. I'm done killing good men.
I'll just leave you lovebirds to it.
You do that. I'm gone.
Can't say I like your attitude, but you've got my gratitude nonetheless.
I thought we were goners! Thank you.
I'm glad you had a change of heart. We'd be cooked for sure if you hadn't come back.
You didn't think twice about killing Mason, but you still came back to free us, why?
That thermal shield gave me the time I needed. End of story.
Never said I wouldn't.
Had to cover my own rear before I could pull yours out of the fire.
I'm selfish, not heartless.
You didn't need to murder him. I'd have given you anything you needed to get us out.
I won't forgive you for that.
I won't think twice about killing you either.
Quit complaining.
Fine... thanks for saving us. Goodbye.
